questions.question: A machine learning engineer has been tasked with fine-tuning a pre-trained text generation model. The text generation model needs to be able to answer to industry-specific terminology and acronyms but is otherwise effective in the business solution. Which approach should you take to fine-tuning this model?
options: Train the model from scratch using new or updated data.
Use the pre-trained model as is and have it learn over time.
Use a custom dataset to fine-tune the model with domain-specific data.
Change the hyperparameters on the pre-trained model.
correct_answers: Use a custom dataset to fine-tune the model with domain-specific data.
